Event Table (Rank) Event Table (All) import { Component, Input, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { LazyLoadEvent } from 'primeng/api'; import { Ns2HttpService } from 'app/shared/service/ns2-http.service'; import { CustomToastService } from 'app/layouts/service/customtoast.service'; import { DateUtilsService } from 'app/core/util/date-utils.service'; import { ExportUtilsService } from 'app/core/util/export-utils.service'; import { EnquiryNSmanService } from 'app/enquiry/nsman/service/enquiry-nsman.service'; import { NSmanPersonalInfo } from 'app/enquiry/nsman/model/nsman.model'; @Component({ selector: 'n2-nsman-payroll-kah-rnsa-tab', templateUrl: './nsman-payroll-kah-rnsa-tab.component.html', styleUrls: ['./nsman-payroll-kah-rnsa-tab.component.scss'] }) export class NsmanPayrollKahRnsaTabComponent implements OnInit { @Input() nsmanInfo: NSmanPersonalInfo; displayEventTableDialog: any = { display: false }; // LazyLoad variables totalRecords?: number; loading?: boolean; pageData: { currentPage: number } = { currentPage: 0 } pageSize = 10; lazyLoadEvent: LazyLoadEvent; kahRnsaList: any[] = []; rankOnly: boolean; viewValidOrAll = "all"; constructor( private ns2HttpService: Ns2HttpService, private toastService: CustomToastService, private dateUtilsService: DateUtilsService, private exportUtilsService: ExportUtilsService, private enquiryNSmanService: EnquiryNSmanService, ) {} ngOnInit(): void { // } load(event: LazyLoadEvent): void { this.loading = false; this.kahRnsaList = []; this.totalRecords = 0; } onPage(event: any): void { this.pageSize = event.rows; this.pageData.currentPage = event.first / event.rows; } exportCSV(): void { // } showAllRecords(): void { // } showValidRecords(): void { // } onOpen(dialog: any): void { dialog.display = true; } setShowRankEventsOnly(): void { this.rankOnly = true; } setShowAllEvents(): void { this.rankOnly = false; } }
